content: this legal text summarizes a court ruling in a case involving multiple parties the court has ordered the allocation of funds obtained from the sale of a property to the parties involved based on a 50 ratio among the coheirs the court has also ordered the payment of costs and attorney fees to certain parties the case revolves around a dispute over the division of property among coowners and the enforcement of a previous court order throughout the proceedings the court has addressed objections and requests made by the parties the final ruling made on july 6 2019 in terni disregards opposing requests and directs a delegated professional to implement the distribution of funds the court has authorized the opening of a current account for one party to receive their share of the funds and the bank details of another party will be provided to the delegated professional for payment
